name: subtle-tab
description: A new tab firefox addon and chrome extension
author: Akansh Gulati

scripts.build: npm run symlinks && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.prod: npm run copy && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.watch: npm run symlinks && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev webpack --progress --colors --hide-modules --watch
